    • stockexchangeHasSecurity

      @Query(nativeQuery=true) int stockexchangeHasSecurity(Integer idStockexchange)
      Checks whether a specific stock exchange has any associated securities.
      Parameters:
      idStockexchange - the ID of the stock exchange to check
      Returns:
      1 if at least one security exists; 0 otherwise

    • stockexchangesHasSecurity
